name: Gura's Journey
description:
A tiny little fangame, based off of Hololive's Gawr Gura, and her... adventures in Minecraft.

This is an exceptionally short maze game; if you know the correct path through each level, the entire game can be beaten in roughly 5-6 minutes. Still, it's the first project I've ever completed, and I wanted to at least put it out there.

Gawr Gura and hololive are (c) Cover Corp. (at least, I think Gura is...)

Minecraft is (c) Mojang

Music obtained from freesfx.co.uk
